item.title: 2 days left to save up to $600 on TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 tickets
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description:
We’re in the final stretch of Ticket Reboot Week with just 48 hours remaining! You can still save up to $600 on individual ticket types to TechCrunch Disrupt 2024. Don’t wait — this offer ends on September 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Don’t miss out on this last big sale before the countdown to Disrupt […]

item.title: After is a new dating app that tries to tackle ghosting
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description:
A new female-founded dating app called After is launching in Austin, Texas on Thursday with the mission of tackling ghosting and holding people accountable.  What sets the app apart from the rest of the dating app scene is that After requires users to share why they have unmatched a person before they are allowed to […]

item.title: The Tor Project merges with Tails, a Linux-based portable OS focused on privacy
item.dc:creator: Paul Sawers
item.description:
The Tor Project is merging operations with Tails, a portable Linux-based operating system focused on preserving user privacy and anonymity.

item.title: Prepared, which wants to ‘revolutionize’ emergency 911 calls, raises $27M
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
A company that claims its tech can “revolutionize” emergency calls has raised $27 million in a Series B round led by Andreessen Horowitz. The company, Prepared, enables 911 dispatchers to get a caller’s real-time GPS location if their phone supports it. Via Prepared, dispatchers can also receive and respond to texts and images, and — […]

item.title: As war rages in Ukraine, investment in European defense and dual-use tech skyrockets
item.dc:creator: Mike Butcher
item.description:
A new Dealroom report shows that VC investment in defense-related tech is outpacing any other type of investment across NATO member states and allies.

item.title: OpenAI’s chief research officer has left following CTO Mira Murati’s exit
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
OpenAI’s chief research officer, Bob McGrew, and a research VP, Barret Zoph, left the company on Wednesday, hours after OpenAI CTO Mira Murati announced she would be departing. CEO Sam Altman revealed the two latest resignations in a post on X Wednesday evening, along with leadership transition plans. “Mira, Bob, and Barret made these decisions […]

item.title: Dinii, a cloud-based restaurant management platform, raises $45M Series B
item.dc:creator: Kate Park
item.description:
Japan has always been a strong market for bringing technology into the experience of consuming food, and now one of the startups leading on this idea is attracting investors from across the ocean. Dinii, which lets diners order food from restaurants and shops through a mobile platform, has raised $48 million (7.46 billion JPY). Bessemer […]

item.title: Pear wants to empower up-and-coming VCs with its new emerging managers in residence program
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description:
When seed-focused Pear VC raised a $432 million fund last year, the firm co-founder Pejman Nozad said that it meant his firm had reached its “own product-market-fit.” That fourth fund was nearly three times larger than its previous $160 million fund. The 11-year-old firm wants to help emerging venture funds follow in Pear’s footsteps. On […]

item.title: Sam Altman reportedly poised to get equity in OpenAI for the first time
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description:
Following the abrupt departure of OpenAI’s CTO, Mira Murati, CEO Sam Altman is reportedly poised to receive equity in the company for the first time as OpenAI moves away from its longstanding nonprofit structure. Reuters, citing people familiar with the matter, reports that OpenAI plans to restructure into a for-profit benefit corporation — similar to […]

item.title: Meta Connect 2024: Orion glasses, Quest 3S headset, Meta AI upgrades, Ray-Ban Meta real-time video, and more
item.dc:creator: Cody Corrall, Morgan Little
item.description:
Meta Connect 2024 is a developer-centric event featuring a keynote from CEO Mark Zuckerberg. He showcased new hardware and software to support two of Meta’s big ambitions: AI and the metaverse. This included everything from new Quest headsets, updates to Meta’s Llama AI model, and even a new fully AR glasses prototype. Meta Connect 2024 […]

item.title: What does Mark Zuckerberg’s shirt say?

item.description:
Three years ago, Mark Zuckerberg’s big day was a flop.
